001package gbw.melange.common.shading.generative;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.shading.IManagedShader;
004
005/**
006 * A generative shader produces information
007 */
008public interface IGenerativeShader<T extends IManagedShader<T>> extends IManagedShader<T> {
009
010
011    T copy();
012    T copyAs(String newLocalName);
013
014
015}
